name: ListFreshserviceTickets
description:
Fetch a list of tickets from Freshservice.

Use this tool to retrieve all tickets currently in Freshservice. Ideal for viewing open or closed tickets and managing support inquiries.

parameters.name: ticket_filter
parameters.description: Apply a pre-defined filter to fetch specific types of tickets. Options are: new_and_my_open, watching, spam, deleted.

value_schema.description: Pre-defined filters. The filters available are [new_and_my_open, watching, spam, deleted].

parameters.name: filter_by_requester_email
parameters.description: Filter tickets by the requester's email address.

value_schema.description: Query param to filter out tickets requester's email id.

parameters.name: requester_id_filter
parameters.description: Filter tickets by the ID of the requester to view those created by a specific user.

value_schema.description: Query param to filter out tickets created by a particular requester.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Filter tickets based on their update timestamp. Use ISO 8601 format, e.g., '2015-01-19T02:00:00Z'.

value_schema.description: Query param to filter out tickets based on updated time. E.g. '?updated_since=2015-01-19T02:00:00Z'.

parameters.name: include_fields_in_response
parameters.description: Specify certain fields to include in the response. Examples: 'stats' for ticket's closed and resolved times, 'requester' for requester's details.

value_schema.description: Query param to include certain fields in response. E.g. '?include=stats' Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. '?include=requester' Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone.

parameters.name: ticket_sort_order
parameters.description: Sort the list of tickets in ascending ('asc') or descending ('desc') order. Default is 'desc'.

value_schema.description: Query param to sort the list of tickets. Supported values - 'asc' and 'desc'. Default is 'desc'

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Pre-defined filters. The filters available are [new_and_my_open, watching, spam, deleted].

value_schema.description: Pre-defined filters. The filters available are [new_and_my_open, watching, spam, deleted].

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Query param to filter out tickets requester's email id.

value_schema.description: Query param to filter out tickets requester's email id.

parameters.name: requester_id
parameters.description: Query param to filter out tickets created by a particular requester.

value_schema.description: Query param to filter out tickets created by a particular requester.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Query param to filter out tickets based on updated time. E.g. '?updated_since=2015-01-19T02:00:00Z'.

value_schema.description: Query param to filter out tickets based on updated time. E.g. '?updated_since=2015-01-19T02:00:00Z'.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Query param to include certain fields in response. E.g. '?include=stats' Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. '?include=requester' Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone.

value_schema.description: Query param to include certain fields in response. E.g. '?include=stats' Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. '?include=requester' Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: Query param to sort the list of tickets. Supported values - 'asc' and 'desc'. Default is 'desc'

value_schema.description: Query param to sort the list of tickets. Supported values - 'asc' and 'desc'. Default is 'desc'
